ticket.title: Translations with interpolated strings (not html_safe)
ticket.original-body:
In #3401 (and commit http://github.com/rails/rails/commit/2675e4ef83b2a0fb38f01140d65fbded3ceac9ab ) the `translate` helper is assumed to return a `html_safe` string. But now the following code will result in a XSS vulnerability:
<%= t(:greeting, :name => @user.name) %>
